segments.text: I came in response to your advertisement for a salesperson .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK , please be seated . May I have your name , please ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK , Woody . Why are you interested in this job ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Because I admire your company . Yours is one of the most effective and respectable companies in this city .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Have you worked anywhere else before ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , five years ago . I began to work in a fashion company in Shanghai . Two years ago , I came to Beijing , and worked in a department store as a salesman .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK , your work experience is impressive , and I think you sound right for this position , but I do have 3 other people to interview , so you'll be hearing from us within a week .
segments.speaker: S2
